summary: The ring of nighteye from Oblivion returns to grace your dungeon crawling experience
descriptionHtml:
MisterBazooka Presents:
The Ring of Nighteye

Remember in Oblivion when you could get a ring of nighteye so you could see in the dark?
Now you can have it in skyrim. You can disenchant it and use it in helms, hoods, rings and
Necklaces.
Enjoy!

MisterBazooka

Just drop the esp in your Data folder, enable and enjoy.


You can find it on the enchanting table in the hall of countenance
 in the College of Winterhold.

Or if you\'re really lazy the baseID is: xx000d65
author: MisterBazooka
